name: ALLAH
text: This name comprises all his names and their meanings.

name: Ar-Rahman
text: The one who acts mercifully.

name: Ar-Rahim
text: The bestower of mercy.

name: Al-Malik
text: The real possessor of power, whose dominion is never to end.

name: Al-Quddus
text: The pure from any imperfection and deficiency.

name: As-Salam
text: The giver of peace.

name: Al-Mu'min
text: The one who arouse faith in hearts.

name: Al-Muhaymin
text: The guardian and overseer.

name: Al-'Aziz
text: The strong who is never defeated.

name: Al-Jabbar
text: The one who does what he wills and is capable to.

name: Al-Mutakabbir
text: The supreme being to whom supremacy belongs.

name: Al-Khaaliq
text: The one who brings everything from nonexistence to existence.

name: Al-Baari
text: The creator of everything properly and concordantly.

name: Al-Musawwir
text: The one who forms his creators in different and special pictures.

name: Al-Ghaffaar
text: The one who covers his slaves’ sins and forgives them.

name: Al-Qahhaar
text: The dominant who has the perfect power over everything.

name: Al-Wahhaab
text: The one who is generous in giving plenty.

name: Ar-Razzaaq
text: The one who provides every creature sustenance and needs.

name: Al-Fattah
text: The one who opens the closed doors and makes things easier.

name: Al-'Alim
text: The one who knows every little thing about everything everlastingly.

name: Al-Qaabid
text: The one who withhold and constrict what he wills.

name: Al-Baasit
text: The one who expands and widens what he wills.

name: Al-Khaafid
text: The one who lowers.

name: Ar-Raafi'
text: The one who raises.

name: Al-Mu'izz
text: The one who gives esteem.

name: Al-Mudhill
text: The one who degrades and humiliates.

name: As-Sami
text: The one who hears everything.

name: Al-Basir
text: The one who sees everything.

name: Al-Hakam
text: The one who judges with wisdom and justice in all matters.

name: Al-'Adl
text: The extremely just one.

name: Al-Lateef
text: The one who knows all things, subtle and hidden.

name: Al-Khabeer
text: The one who knows the truth of everything.

name: Al-Halim
text: The kind and patient.

name: Al-'Adzheem
text: The great and mighty.

name: Al-Ghafuur
text: The forgiving who forgives a lot.

name: Ash-Shakuur
text: The one who gives excessive reward for the good things done for his sake.

name: Al-'Ali
text: The sublime and most high one.

name: Al-Kabeer
text: The one whose greatness has no limit.

name: Al-Hafidh
text: The one who records all deeds in detail.

name: Al-Muqit
text: The one who gives sustenance to all creators.

name: Al-Haseeb
text: The one who takes account of people’s actions.

name: Al-Jaleel
text: The one who is attributed with greatness and glory.

name: Al-Kareem
text: The generous and forgiving.

name: Ar-Raqeeb
text: The one who observes everything.

name: Al-Mujeeb
text: The one who answers prayers and needs.

name: Al-Waasi
text: The beneficent and embracing.

name: Al-Hakim
text: The wise in his orders, words and all matters.

name: Al-Waduud
text: The one who loves his good slaves and his good slaves love him.

name: Al-Majeed
text: The glorious with high status.

name: Al-Ba'ith
text: The one who resurrects the dead ones.

name: Ash-Shaheed
text: The one who is present all times in all places.

name: Al-Haqq
text: The one who truly and invariably exists.

name: Al-Wakeel
text: The one who handles and straightens the matters of those relied upon him.

name: Al-Qawi
text: The strong and powerful.

name: Al-Mateen
text: The firm one.

name: Al-Wali
text: The protecting friend of his good slaves and believers.

name: Al-Hameed
text: The praised one who totally deserves to be praised.

name: Al-Muhsi
text: The one who knows the count of everything without any exceptions.

name: Al-Mubdi
text: The one who created all creators at the beginning from nothing.

name: Al-Mu'id
text: The one who brings back the creatures after death.

name: Al-Muhyi
text: The giver of life and health, the restorer and the forgiving.

name: Al-Mumeet
text: The creator of death and the one who take lives.

name: Al-Hayy
text: The eternally, perfectly and completely living one.

name: Al-Qayyuum
text: The holder of the skies, the earth and everything.

name: Al-Waajid
text: The one who creates what he wills at any time.

name: Al-Maajid
text: The glorious and generous.

name: Al-Waahid
text: The one without a partner.

name: As-Samad
text: The only one to rely upon and revert to.

name: Al-Qaadir
text: The capable one to do what he wills.

name: Al-Muqtadir
text: The one who has power over the strong and capable ones.

name: Al-Muqaddim
text: The one who makes ahead what he wills.

name: Al-Muakhkhir
text: The one who delays what he wills.

name: Al-Awwal
text: The first one whose existence is without a beginning.

name: Al-Akhir
text: The last one whose existence is without an end.

name: Adh-Dhahir
text: The manifest.

name: Al-Batin
text: The hidden.

name: Al-Wali
text: The only one who manages everything.

name: Al-Muta'ali
text: The high exalted who is clear from the attributes of the creation.

name: Al-Barr
text: The one whose goodness, kindness and blessings are given generously to his slaves.

name: At-Tawwab
text: The one who accepts repentance.

name: Al-Muntaqim
text: The one who avenges and punishes sinners justly.

name: Al-'Afuw
text: The one with wide forgiveness and mercy.

name: Ar-Ra'uf
text: The kind, compassionate and merciful.

name: Malik-ul-Mulk
text: The one whose dominion is never to end.

name: Dhul Jalali wal Ikram
text: The possessor of majesty and grace.

name: Al-Muqsit
text: The one who handles everything equally and properly.

name: Aj-Jami'
text: The one who gathers what he wills when he will where he wills.

name: Al-Ghani
text: The wealthiest.

name: Al-Mughni
text: The one who enriches whoever he willed.

name: Al-Mani'
text: The one who prevents some things from happening.

name: Ad-Darr
text: The one who makes harm and pain reach whomever he willed.

name: An-Nafi'
text: The one who creates benefits and favor.

name: An-Nur
text: The one who lightens the world.

name: Al-Hadi
text: The one who guides to the truth and the right path.

name: Al-Badi'
text: The one who creates the astonishing creation without any preceding examples.

name: Al-Baqi
text: The everlasting one that the state of non-existence is impossible for him.

name: Al-Warith
text: The real possessor of all possessions.

name: Ar-Rashid
text: The one who guides all matters to the written end in order and wisdom.

name: As-Sabuur
text: The one who is very patient.

name: Es-Sabûr
text: Çok sabırlı olan.
